name: Re-Formatted
description:
Barry is living his day to day life as usual. You have 5 days to help him repair his life.

2020 Global Game Jam Submission (Theme: Repair). 

Programming / Music / Sound Effects by Dennis Snyder

Graphics by Sebastian Maurer

Built in GameMaker Studio 2, Art created through Piskel, Music composed through BoscaCeoil, Sound Effects through Chiptone.
